samples.name: Default Functionalities
samples.description: A simple and lightweight TimePicker component for JavaScript (TypeScript) for selecting times that is customizable to fit large-scale applications

samples.name: Time Range
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to disable the specific range of times(min and max) in a JavaScript (TypeScript) TimePicker

samples.name: Format
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to change the time format in the input field based on the format in a JavaScript (TypeScript) TimePicker

samples.name: Time Duration
samples.description: A simple TimePicker widget for JavaScript (TypeScript) for highlighting a set of time intervals in a pop-up by adding custom styles based on you needs
